title: Tidy Intelligence
text:
Economist by 🎓 and data scientist by ❤️


  
    
  
  
Hi there, I’m Christoph!
As a graduate financial economist, I have acquired an extensive hypothesis–driven research and problem–solving expertise in data wrangling, statistical analysis, and model development.
As a data science professional, I have experience in developing business intelligence tools, prototyping data-driven products, and designing data pipelines.
